sections.summary: providing general administrative back-up and other duties. more than 5 years of clerical support. familiar and experienced with electronic filing systems, various document management technologies, and scanning experience. knowledge of filing systems and standards. proficiency working with document management systems. able to multi-task and efficiently manage changing priorities. excellent organizational and analytical skills, with attention to detail.
